info.name: 🔗 LinkFlow API
info.description:
Complete API collection for **LinkFlow** — Workflow Automation Platform

## 🚀 Getting Started
1. Import this collection and the environment file
2. Run **Register** or **Login** to get auth tokens
3. Tokens are saved automatically to `{{access_token}}` and `{{refresh_token}}`
4. Run **List Workspaces** to populate `{{workspace_id}}`
5. All authenticated requests inherit the Bearer token

## 🔐 Authentication
Bearer Token via Laravel Passport. Public routes override with `noauth`.

## 📂 Structure
- **🔐 Auth** — Register, Login, Refresh Token, Password Reset
- **👤 User Profile** — Profile CRUD, Avatar
- **🏢 Workspaces** — Workspace management with nested resources
- **🧩 Nodes** — Node registry (global)
- **🔓 Credential Types** — Available credential types (global)
- **📝 Workflow Templates** — Pre-built templates (global)
- **📋 Plans** — Subscription plans (public)
- **📡 Public Webhooks** — Incoming webhook receiver
- **⚙️ Internal** — Engine callbacks & Stripe webhooks
- **🛡️ Admin** — Super admin panel

request.description: Check API health status. Returns `ok` with a timestamp.

item.name: 🔐 Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints — registration, login, token refresh, password management, and email verification.

request.description: Register a new user account. A default workspace and free subscription are created automatically.
Authenticate and receive access and refresh tokens.
Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access token pair.
Revoke the current access token and related refresh tokens.
Send a password reset link to the given email address.
Reset password using the token received via email.
Resend the email verification link to the authenticated user.

item.name: 👤 User Profile
item.description: Manage the authenticated user's profile, password, and avatar.

request.description: Get the authenticated user's profile.
Update user profile fields (first_name, last_name, email).
Change the authenticated user's password.

formdata.description: Image file (jpg, jpeg, png, webp) max 2MB

request.description: Upload a new avatar image for the authenticated user.
Remove the authenticated user's avatar.
Permanently delete the authenticated user's account.

item.name: 🏢 Workspaces
item.description: Workspace management and all workspace-scoped resources (workflows, executions, credentials, etc.).

request.description: List all workspaces the authenticated user belongs to.
Create a new workspace. The authenticated user becomes the owner.
Get workspace details by ID.
Update workspace details. Requires `workspace.update` permission.
Delete a workspace. Only the owner can delete.
Leave a workspace. The owner cannot leave — must transfer ownership or delete.

item.name: 👥 Members
item.description: Manage workspace members and their roles.

request.description: List all members of a workspace.
Update a member's role. Roles: `owner`, `admin`, `member`, `viewer`.
Remove a member from the workspace.

item.name: ✉️ Invitations
item.description: Send, manage, and respond to workspace invitations.

request.description: List pending invitations for a workspace.
Send an invitation to join the workspace.
Cancel a pending invitation.
Accept a workspace invitation using the token from the email.
Decline a workspace invitation.

item.name: 💰 Subscription
item.description: Manage workspace subscription plan.

request.description: Get the current workspace subscription details.
Subscribe the workspace to a plan.
Cancel the current workspace subscription.

item.name: ⚡ Workflows
item.description: CRUD operations and actions for workflows within a workspace.

request.description: List all workflows in the workspace.
Create a new workflow in the workspace.
Get workflow details by ID.
Update an existing workflow.
Delete a workflow.
Activate a workflow so it can be triggered.
Deactivate a workflow to stop it from being triggered.
Create a copy of an existing workflow.
Compile and validate typed workflow contracts, then persist a snapshot.
Fetch the latest saved contract snapshot for this workflow.
Promote a workflow from one workspace environment to another.
Rollback a workflow environment to a target workflow version.
List promotion and rollback release history for this workflow.

item.name: 🔄 Executions
item.description: Monitor, manage, and trigger workflow executions.

item.name: 🤖 AI Auto-Fix
item.description: AI-powered execution analysis and auto-fix.

request.description: Analyze an execution failure to determine root cause.
Apply a suggested fix to the workflow.
List all executions in the workspace.
Get execution details by ID.
Get aggregated execution statistics for the workspace.
Get the node-level results of an execution.
Get logs for a specific execution.
Retry a failed execution.
Cancel a running execution.
Delete an execution record.
Manually trigger a workflow execution with optional input data.
List all executions for a specific workflow.
Retrieve deterministic replay artifacts captured for an execution.
Start a deterministic replay execution using captured fixtures.
Get time-travel debugger timeline for the execution.
Get execution state snapshot at a specific timeline sequence.
Compare this execution timeline against another execution ID.
Stream live execution logs via Server-Sent Events.

item.name: 🔑 Credentials
item.description: Manage integration credentials (API keys, OAuth tokens, etc.) for a workspace.

request.description: List all credentials in the workspace.
Create a new credential for the workspace.
Get credential details by ID.
Update an existing credential.
Delete a credential.
Test if the credential is valid and can connect.

item.name: 🪝 Webhooks
item.description: Manage webhook endpoints for triggering workflows.

request.description: List all webhooks in the workspace.
Create a new webhook for a workflow.
Get webhook details by ID.
Update an existing webhook.
Delete a webhook.
Regenerate the webhook UUID. The old URL will stop working.
Activate a webhook so it can receive requests.
Deactivate a webhook to stop receiving requests.
Get the webhook associated with a specific workflow.

item.name: 📦 Variables
item.description: Manage workspace-scoped environment variables for use in workflows.

request.description: List all variables in the workspace.
Create a new workspace variable.
Get a variable by ID.
Update a variable's value.
Delete a variable.

item.name: 🏷️ Tags
item.description: Manage tags for organizing workflows.

request.description: List all tags in the workspace.
Create a new tag.
Update a tag's name or color.
Delete a tag.

item.name: 📋 Activity Log
item.description: View workspace activity history.

request.description: Get the workspace activity log.

item.name: 💳 Billing
item.description: Stripe billing management — checkout, portal, plan changes.

request.description: Get billing information for the workspace.
Create a Stripe Checkout session for subscribing to a plan.
Create a Stripe Customer Portal session for managing billing.
Cancel the billing subscription.
Resume a cancelled billing subscription.
Change the workspace's billing plan.

item.name: 📌 Workflow Versions
item.description: Version control for workflows — create snapshots, compare, publish, and restore.

request.description: List all versions of a workflow.
Create a new version snapshot of the workflow.
Get a specific workflow version.
Compare two workflow versions side by side.
Publish a version as the active workflow version.
Restore the workflow to a previous version.

item.name: 📤 Workflow Import/Export
item.description: Import and export workflows as JSON files.

request.description: Export a single workflow as JSON.
Export multiple workflows as a single JSON bundle.
Import a workflow from a JSON file.

item.name: 🧠 Contracts
item.description: Workspace-level contract compilation and test runs.

request.description: Run contract checks for all workflows in the workspace.

item.name: 🧑‍⚖️ Approvals
item.description: Human-in-the-loop approval queue and decisions.

request.description: List pending and resolved approval checkpoints.
Get details for a specific workflow approval item.
Approve or reject an approval item and resume execution flow.

item.name: 🛡️ Policy
item.description: Workspace governance and guardrails.

request.description: Get the currently configured workspace policy.
Create or update policy constraints for node types, models, and costs.

item.name: 📈 Connector Reliability
item.description: Connector quality metrics and call attempts.

request.description: Get reliability metrics grouped by connector and operation.
Get paginated recent call attempts for a connector.

item.name: 💸 Optimizations
item.description: Cost optimization recommendations and execution estimates.

request.description: Get workspace-level optimization recommendations.
Calculate and return estimated execution cost in USD.

item.name: 🌿 Environments
item.description: Workspace environment definitions used for promotions.

request.description: List all workspace environments.
Create a workspace environment backed by a git branch.

item.name: 🧯 Runbooks
item.description: Failure runbooks generated from execution incidents.

request.description: List execution runbooks with pagination.
Get a single runbook with acknowledgement details.
Mark a runbook as acknowledged by the current user.
Mark a runbook as resolved after remediation.

item.name: 🤖 AI Workflow Generator
item.description: Generate and refine workflows using AI.

request.description: Generate a new workflow from a natural language prompt.
Refine an existing workflow based on feedback.
List past AI workflow generation requests.
Delete a specific generation log entry.
List past AI auto-fix attempts.

item.name: 🧩 Nodes
item.description: Browse and search the node registry. Nodes are the building blocks of workflows.

request.description: List all available node types.
List all node categories.
Search for nodes by name or keyword.
Get full details for a specific node type (schema, inputs, outputs).

item.name: 🔓 Credential Types
item.description: Browse available credential types and their configuration schemas.

request.description: List all available credential types.
Get details and configuration schema for a credential type.

item.name: 📝 Workflow Templates
item.description: Browse and use pre-built workflow templates.

request.description: List all available workflow templates.
List all template categories.
Get a specific template by slug.
Create a workflow from a template in the specified workspace.

item.name: 📋 Plans
item.description: Browse available subscription plans (public, no auth required).

request.description: List all available subscription plans. This is a public endpoint.

item.name: 📡 Public Webhooks
item.description: Incoming webhook receiver — triggers workflow executions. No authentication required.

request.description: Send a payload to a public webhook URL to trigger a workflow execution.
Send a payload to a webhook URL with an additional path segment.

item.name: ⚙️ Internal
item.description: Internal endpoints used by the Go engine and Stripe. Not for direct API consumption.

item.name: 🔧 Job Callbacks
item.description: Callbacks from the Go execution engine (HMAC-signed).

request.description: Callback from the Go engine when a job completes. Authenticated via HMAC signature.
Progress update from the Go engine during job execution.

item.name: 💳 Stripe Webhook
item.description: Stripe webhook endpoint for payment event processing.

request.description: Stripe sends payment events to this endpoint. Verified via Stripe signature.

item.name: 🛡️ Admin
item.description: Super Admin panel endpoints. Uses session-based authentication (not Bearer tokens).

request.description: Login to the admin panel (session-based auth).
Get the current admin's profile.
Logout from the admin panel.
